message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $12,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $8,000 for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is my initial asking price.  To make this work, I can come down to $10,000. This product is truly worth it, and I believe you'll find it's a fair price.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am comfortable with paying $9,000 for the product.
